verses.verse: <S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and to all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H1697>them:<s%> 'This is the thing which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded,<s%>

<S%H376>Whatever<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> there is of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who <S%H7819>kills<s%> a <S%H7794>bull,<s%> or <S%H3775>lamb,<s%> or <S%H5795>goat,<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> or who <S%H7819>kills<s%> it <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%>

and <S%H935>hasn't<s%> brought it to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> it as an <S%H7133>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be <S%H2803>imputed<s%> to that <S%H376>man.<s%> He has <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood;<s%> and that <S%H376>man<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

This is to the end that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> may <S%H935>bring<s%> their <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> which they <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field,<s%> that they may <S%H935>bring<s%> them to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> them for sacrifices of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H2077>offerings<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> and <S%H6999>burn<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> for a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

They shall no more <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> their <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> to the <S%H8163>goat<s%> <S%H310>idols,<s%> after which they play the <S%H2181>prostitute.<s%> This shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> to them throughout their <S%H1755>generations.<s%>'

"You shall <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H376>them,<s%> 'Any man there is of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or of the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> who live as <S%H1481>foreigners<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H5927>them,<s%> who offers a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> or <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%>

and <S%H935>doesn't<s%> bring it to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> to <S%H6213>sacrifice<s%> it to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> that <S%H376>man<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'Any man of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or of the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> who live as <S%H1481>foreigners<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H398>them,<s%> who eats any kind of <S%H1818>blood,<s%> I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H5315>soul<s%> who <S%H398>eats<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and will cut him <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

For the <S%H5315>life<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is in the <S%H1818>blood;<s%> and I have <S%H5414>given<s%> it to you on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for your <S%H5315>souls:<s%> for it is the <S%H1818>blood<s%> that makes <S%H3722>atonement<s%> by reason of the <S%H5315>life.<s%>

Therefore I have <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "No <S%H5315>person<s%> among you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> neither shall any <S%H1616>stranger<s%> who lives as a <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>"

<S%H376><s%>"'Whatever man there is of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or of the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> who live as <S%H1481>foreigners<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H6718>them,<s%> who takes in <S%H6679>hunting<s%> any <S%H2416>animal<s%> or <S%H5775>bird<s%> that may be <S%H398>eaten;<s%> he shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> out its <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H3680>cover<s%> it with <S%H6083>dust.<s%>

For as to the <S%H5315>life<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> its <S%H1818>blood<s%> is with its <S%H5315>life:<s%> therefore I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of any kind of <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> for the <S%H5315>life<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is its <S%H1818>blood.<s%> Whoever <S%H398>eats<s%> it shall be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>"

<S%H5315><s%>"'Every person that <S%H398>eats<s%> what <S%H5038>dies<s%> of <S%H2966>itself,<s%> or that which is torn by <S%H249>animals,<s%> whether he is native-born or a <S%H1616>foreigner,<s%> he shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H3526>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening:<s%> then he shall be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>
But if he <S%H3526>doesn't<s%> wash <S%H7364>them,<s%> or bathe his <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> then he shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>'"
